readable.title: 3509611207_7645b1d28d
readable.content: a young group of girls covering her hair posing together outside of a building . There are three girls with head scarves in front of a worn down building and a family walking in the background . Three girls with head wraps carrying objects while standing on unpaved surface . Three women are walking through the street in a rural Middle-Eastern town . Three women with headscarfs holding packages , two smiling , one not .
